content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Backswing You deal the attack's normal damage to yourself instead of the target. Melee
Wide Open You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn. Ranged
Tripped You fall prone. Unarmed
Tangled in your Gear You are encumbered until you spend 2 Interact action to free your self. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #21
